communicate_checks.justification:
Information '17.99' communicated in the message:
 'The cheapest available option is the **Black Desk Lamp with medium brightness and an AC adapter**, which is priced at **$135.24**.

Since your original lamp was $153.23, you will receive a refund of **$17.99** to your gift card (ID: `gift_card_7245904`).

To proceed, I will modify order **#W9300146** by replacing the current Desk Lamp (item ID: `9190635437`) with the new one (item ID: `5320792178`). Please note that once this modification is made, the order status will change to "pending (items modified)" and no further changes or cancellations can be made to this order.

Could you please confirm if you would like to go ahead with this change?'
